source.name: Q1
source.instructions:
In an Elasticsearch cluster consists of three nodes. 
A data stream named `logs-ds` has been created for storing logs. 
Upon checking the cluster health, it is observed that the status is `yellow`.

What are the possible causes for the yellow health status?

answers.answer: Insufficient number of nodes in the cluster.
The data stream name is not properly configured.
Replication factor is set to 0 for the "LogsDataStream."
